channel.title: Motion Theory (exclusive mixes)
channel.description: Whats up everybody! DJ Motion Theory here. This show provides some of the sickest electronic music around. I will have new material on the show for you all the time featuring the freshest cutting edge tracks from premier producers worldwide, ranging from smooth sailing house to pissed off breaks and everything in between. Rock it baby! aw yeah.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Breakbeats, house, techno, progressive, Burning Man, mix, electro, electronica, acid, nu skool, funky, UK, USA, trance, party, club, rave, playa, digweed, sasha, motion, theory, top, DJ, mix,
channel.itunes:author: Andrew Brattain

item.title: Greetings From Jupiter
item.description: Some nice warm house for cold winter nights. Track list coming soon
item.dc:creator: Andrew Brattain
item.itunes:summary: Some nice warm house for cold winter nights. Track list coming soon

item.title: Living in a Bubble - May 2010
item.description: This is an hour long mix of some great deep and grooving house tracks that carry the patio sounds of summer .
item.dc:creator: Andrew Brattain
item.itunes:summary: This is an hour long mix of some great deep and grooving house tracks that carry the patio sounds of summer .

item.title: October 2009
item.description: This is a nice mix of tech house/techno/progressive tracks that have been helping me get the dancefloors going during these fall months. Enjoy! 1. Alexander Madness - Moment of Glory 2. Fiord - Get Up Jude (Beckers Remix) 3. Marco Sapiens - Blueyellow 4. Gabe, Riktam - Simple Jack 5. Victor G - Sleepy Days (Nicholas Van Orton Remix) 6. Freeker 5 - Night in the Forest 7. Khainz - Detectzor (Kinky Beats Edit) 8. Umek - You Might Hear Nothing 9. Paul Ritch - Split the Line (Dubfire's Mega remix) 10. Riktam, Bansi - Green Space 11. Kris B, Nosmo - Yes We Did 12. Yvel & Tristan - Heart & Soul
item.dc:creator: Andrew Brattain
item.itunes:summary:
This is a nice mix of tech house/techno/progressive tracks that have been helping me get the dancefloors going during these fall months. Enjoy!
1. Alexander Madness - Moment of Glory 2. Fiord - Get Up Jude (Beckers Remix) 3. Marco Sapiens - Blueyellow 4. Gabe, Riktam - Simple Jack 5. Victor G - Sleepy Days (Nicholas Van Orton Remix) 6. Freeker 5 - Night in the Forest 7. Khainz - Detectzor (Kinky Beats Edit) 8. Umek - You Might Hear Nothing 9. Paul Ritch - Split the Line (Dubfire's Mega remix) 10. Riktam, Bansi - Green Space 11. Kris B, Nosmo - Yes We Did 12. Yvel & Tristan - Heart & Soul

item.title: 3 A.M.
item.description: This is an 80 min mix of smooth sailing progressive house, as promised. I recorded this one on march 8th 2008. This mix is deep and driving right from the start with hints of atmospheric melodies underneath. Track List 1. Nick Orisun - Balance 2. Tony Mendez, Shushi - Tribal Space 3. Sabiani - Sunday Trip 4. Nacho Casco, Flymars - Orbital Night 5. Tony Mendez - In Progress (dark version) 6. Edu Del Doce - Doce Estampas (dub mix) 7. Nicholas Van Orton - Picatwo 8. Nacho Casco, Flymars - Blind Pervert 9. Phonosys - On Your Side 10. Victoria R. - Acting Over Reality 11. Ugur Yurt - Clubbin Zone 12. Heatsteric - Boiling Point 13. Habakus - My Angel Hook (giuppy black drill remix) 14. Adbeat - Secret (nikko.z club mix) 15. Mox Codeta - Positive
item.dc:creator: Andrew Brattain
item.itunes:summary:
This is an 80 min mix of smooth sailing progressive house, as promised. I recorded this one on march 8th 2008. This mix is deep and driving right from the start with hints of atmospheric melodies underneath.
Track List
1. Nick Orisun - Balance 2. Tony Mendez, Shushi - Tribal Space 3. Sabiani - Sunday Trip 4. Nacho Casco, Flymars - Orbital Night 5. Tony Mendez - In Progress (dark version) 6. Edu Del Doce - Doce Estampas (dub mix) 7. Nicholas Van Orton - Picatwo 8. Nacho Casco, Flymars - Blind Pervert 9. Phonosys - On Your Side 10. Victoria R. - Acting Over Reality 11. item.title: Focus
item.description: This is a sleek blend of some hypnotic house that I recorded late in 2008. Its on the dark, techy and progressive side for the most part. its about 71 min long. Hope you like it. TRACK LIST 1. Save the Cheerleader, Save the World - Beat Bizarre 2. Kiss My Plastic (tt's remix progressive edit) - Mannequin 3. Rubicon - Avilo 4. Der Schritt - Jaydas 5. Surface 'Reborn' feat.Panoptic (quiver remix)- Jay Lumen 6. Kavuki - Diogo Riberio 7. Do Not Cross - Johan Vermeulen 8. Little Things (hernan cerbello mix) - Art Patrice 9. White Lobster (remy mix) - Oliver Molden,Jerome Isma-Aa 10. Dreams (mindskap & mike morales Truckdriver mix) - Chris Soul 11. Trapped - (avilo remix) - Kasay Taylor 12. Shnorkel(dousk remix) - Ido Opher, Miki Litvak 13. Cubic Loop ( d-nox & beckers remix) - NOP 14. Sunset Armenia (mix 2) - Santiago Deep

item.title: Playa Breaks - Volume 2. (Playa Funk - Burning Man 2007)
item.description: You guys are gonna love this one! Straight up dancefloor mix here. Rockin tasty breakbeats the whole way through. Throw this one on and enjoy the ride.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Brattain
item.itunes:summary: You guys are gonna love this one! Straight up dancefloor mix here. Rockin tasty breakbeats the whole way through. Throw this one on and enjoy the ride.

item.title: Motion Theory - Seismic
item.description: This is a slammin' mix I recorded in the summer of 2006. This set has all of the ingredients to set a party off! Your gonna love this one. Sooo Wicked! TRACK LIST 1. Decoder & Substance - On and On 2. Curcuit Breaker - Gatewayus 3. Lucky 7 - Pump Up the Jam (remix) 4. Jay Cunning & Smithmonger - Never Stop (Splitloop remix) 5. Precision Cuts - Takin Over (Zero & Mr.B remix) 6. Metric & Rogers - This is Hip Hop ( Koma & Bones remix) 7. General Midi - Turn It Loud 8. Peter Paul - This Is My Full Contact 9. Klaus "Heavyweight" Hill - Poppers 10. Meat Katie & Elite Force - The Answer (Force Mass Motion Phunk Acid mix) 11. Rennie Pilgrem & Roxiller - Bug 12. KG - Flying Saucer 13. Dylan Rhymes - Dead Famous
